content.name: Translated Games

content.name: Giga Monstergirl HGames collection
content.desc: A fuckton of Monster girl games from DLSite, animations, and tools to work with their different game engines

content.name: Fap Hero
content.desc: Beat your meat to the beat! Courtesy of /h/

content.name: Free Cities (pregmod)
content.desc: A compiled-to-html text-based slave manager game. Playable on PC and smart phone via web browser. Active development and easily cheat using JS. It's an extension of long-dead free cities game  https: //www.freecitieslib.club/ with a lot of QoL improvment and more mods.
